sub_title: Was the Chairman at SchoolSupport4Afghanistan and Mechanical Engineering teacher
summary: Schoolsupport4afghanistan was an Afghan-Dutch foundation which was active in the reconstruction of education in Afghanistan. Within our possibilities we where helping schools with rebuilding the classrooms,buying equipment, machines and tools.We installed all the machines and we teach the teachers how to use them.

projects:
[{'title': 'Afghanistan Mazar-e-Sharif', 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}}, 'description': 'A German friend asked me to come to Mazar-e-Sharif to help him with an education project.
I have visit several associations in Mazar - e - Sharif with the help of Schoolsupport4afghanistan.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'John', 'last_name': 'Langerak', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Was the Chairman at SchoolSupport4Afghanistan and Mechanical Engineering teacher'}]}, {'title': 'Afghanistan Kabul', 'date': {'start': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}}, 'description': 'When the two containers with machines and equipment arrived in Afghanistan ,I went back to Kabul. 
With Schoolsupport4afghanistan we have brought Electrical and Automotive equipment and installed Metall Working Machines in Kabul Auto Mechanical Institute in Chelseton - Jangalak - Kabul.
After installing the Metall Machines we have trained the teachers how to work safe with these equipment. The new classrooms have been opened by Deputy Minister Mr. Asif Nang.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'John', 'last_name': 'Langerak', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Was the Chairman at SchoolSupport4Afghanistan and Mechanical Engineering teacher'}]}, {'title': 'Afghanistan Takhta Pul', 'date': {'start': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'description': 'I have given an Training for 18 teachers in the subject of Drawing on the Technical School in Takhta Pul.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'John', 'last_name': 'Langerak', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Was the Chairman at SchoolSupport4Afghanistan and Mechanical Engineering teacher'}]}, {'title': 'Afghanistan Takhta Pul', 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'description': 'I have been working on a Technical School in Takhta Pul. This on the road from Mazar-e-Sharif to Balkh.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'John', 'last_name': 'Langerak', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Was the Chairman at SchoolSupport4Afghanistan and Mechanical Engineering teacher'}]}, {'title': 'Afghanistan - Bamiyan', 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'description': 'We from Schoolsupport have brought two containers with machines and equipment for the departments, Auto-Motive, Carpentary, Electrical and Metall working.
We have installed the workshops for Electrical and Metall working. 
I have visit our Project schools from 2009 (Technic Sanawi) and 2012 (Auto Mechanical) in Kabul and have written an evaluation report.
I also visit the Technical School in Maidan Wardak Province and did a survey about this School.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'John', 'last_name': 'Langerak', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Was the Chairman at SchoolSupport4Afghanistan and Mechanical Engineering teacher'}]}, {'title': 'Afghanistan-Maidan Wardak', 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'description': 'In this totall empty nice school building we have installed machines and equipment for the departments of 
Auto-Motive, Electrical, Carpentary and Metall working machines.
I have trained the teachers theoretical and practical how to use the Metall machines in a safe way and how to maintenance the machines. The workshops and classrooms where opened by the Governor Mr. Hayatullah Hayat. [{'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'NGO - Schoolsupport4afghanistan', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Terneuzen, Zeeland, Nederland', 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'NGO - Schoolsupport4afghanistan', 'description': 'In Afghanistan heb ik via contacten zoals het Ministerie van Onderwijs nieuwe (school) projecten gevonden, welke wij als schoolsupport hebben uitgevoerd.

In Kabul ,Jalalabad , Maidan Wardak en Bamiyan hebben we de containers zelf ontvangen en de machines in de school lokalen geplaatst, opgebouwd en aangesloten.
